meanings.sent1: The dress was the costliest item in the store.
meanings.sent2: The costliest car in the showroom was a luxury sports car.
meanings.sent3: Buying the costliest dessert on the menu made everyone at the table gasp.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the costliest jewel in his treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The costliest mistake he made was not investing in his education.

meanings.definition: Requiring a large amount of money to purchase or maintain.
meanings.sent1: The costliest option for the vacation was the all-inclusive package.
meanings.sent2: Maintaining the costliest yacht in the marina was a challenge.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to impress her with the costliest bouquet backfired when she revealed she preferred wildflowers.
meanings.sent4: The costliest road to success is paved with determination and hard work.
meanings.sent5: The costliest lesson he learned was the value of true friendship.
